relations.target: vibe: a distinctive emotional aura experienced instinctively; 'that place gave me bad vibrations'; 'it gave me a nostalgic vibe' <i61877>
feel: undergo an emotional sensation or be in a particular state of mind; 'She felt resentful'; 'He felt regret' <i30595>
